body:
Comment 3: 
introduced in rev 4fa0edc28df9.

This is because cmd/godoc intentionally passed a non-existent dir ("/prefix") to
go/build.(*Context).ImportDir.

i think this is evidence that revision 4fa0edc28df9 breaks Go 1 API compatibilty
(we were not clear whether the directory provided to ImportDIr must exist or not).
